comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content:
This picture appears to have been taken from the northeast corner of 25th and Broad showing the buildings at the northwest corner that were demolished for the fire station and Patrick Henry Park.

The Church Hill Bank (now SunTrust) is on the northeast corner and the corner of the bank appears to be in the foreground.

comment.author: 56627536@N00
comment._content: I was not even born! beautiful picture.
